content: this pattern was designed especially for a hundred ravens urban legends yarn club the legend is sharks on the subway the season is warm therefore it *had* to be a beach pattern the shark tank features a shark tooth inspired border and an all-over bubble mesh pattern it is fitted at the bust but relaxed at the waist for a casual summer look and the airiness of the fabric ensures you ll be able to keep your cool in the hot sun despite it being made from fine wool the best part is this pattern only requires one 400-yd skein of fingering wool to make even up to size 5x it works up so quickly you ll want one in every color
